pull_request.title: make source accessible
pull_request.body:
an alternative to this [pr](https://github.com/grafana/grafana-plugin-sdk-go/pull/791)

allows accessing the source value from the error so we can set it on the response.  if we merge the other one, we don't need this

pull_request.title: use custom error to capture source
pull_request.body:
This just makes it a bit easier to return the source of the error from plugins, by just returning an error.

Had to move the custom error out of experimental to avoid a cycle.  The real change is [here](https://github.com/grafana/grafana-plugin-sdk-go/compare/allow-error-to-capture-source?expand=1#diff-c400f8ff8ffe44b590bf17b2c96ef57df9de255c8b72627ed1fdfecd0b6f007eR179-R185).

release.name: v0.188.2
release.body:
## What's Changed
* default bad request/400 to downstream error by @scottlepp in https://github.com/grafana/grafana-plugin-sdk-go/pull/790


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grafana/grafana-plugin-sdk-go/compare/v0.188.1...v0.188.2
release.short_description_html:
What's Changed

  • default bad request/400 to downstream error by @scottlepp in #790

Full Changelog: v0.188.1...v0.188.2

pull_request.title: default bad request/400 to downstream error
pull_request.body:
Makes a 400 a downstream error.

These are essentially opinionated defaults.  IMO, by the time a plugin is released, it's doubtful a bad request will occur because of the plugin.  It's more likely a bad query that was entered by the user.

issue.title: Chore: update google.golang.org/grpc dependency to fix vulnerability

comment.body: @andresmgot didn't know that. Should we add some pipeline PRs to make this visible?

review.body:
Unfortunately, this breaks the compatibility with Grafana (that would need to be updated first):

```
$ make build
generate go files
/home/andres/go/bin/wire-v0.5.0 gen -tags "oss" ./pkg/server
wire: go [list -e -json -compiled=true -test=false -export=false -deps=true -find=false -tags=wireinject oss -- ./pkg/server]: exit status 1: go: cloud.google.com/go@v0.110.6 requires
		google.golang.org/genproto/googleapis/api@v0.0.0-20230530153820-e85fd2cbaebc: missing go.sum entry for go.mod file; to add it:
		go mod download google.golang.org/genproto/googleapis/api
	
wire: generate failed
make: *** [Makefile:113: gen-go] Error 1
```

You need to update `grpc` there before updating the SDK

pull_request.title: Chore: update google.golang.org/grpc dependency to fix vulnerability

* Chore: Fix lint warnings with golangci-lint version 1.54.2 by @xnyo in https://github.com/grafana/grafana-plugin-sdk-go/pull/779
